name: Neon Fighter (itch)
description:
I made this game for a university project.

The point of the game is to shoot the enemies and collect as many points as you can.
There are 3 levels of difficulty and they start when you reach a certain amount of points.
The more HP an enemy has, the slower it moves, so you have more time to shoot it or to get out of it's way.

Play and aim to beat your highscore!
